title: Avalanche's AVAX Extends Weekly Losses to 18% as Institutional Backing Fails to Lift Market
source: CoinDesk: Bitcoin, Ethereum, Crypto News and Price Data

body.raw: AVAX tumbled alongside the rest of the crypto market, extending a weeklong slide despite Anthony Scaramucci-backed AVAX Oneâ€™s rebrand.
